Line 32: Line 32:
* Quicken stopped supporting its software in the United Kingdom in 2005 leaving many thousands of users with only partially functional software. <ref name="uk2003">{{cite web |url=http://www.theregister.co.uk/2005/01/17/quicken_killed_off/|title=Intuit UK kills Quicken and TaxCalc |work=The Register|date=[[2005-01-17]] |first=John |last=Oates |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref>
* Quicken stopped supporting its software in the United Kingdom in 2005 leaving many thousands of users with only partially functional software. <ref name="uk2003">{{cite web |url=http://www.theregister.co.uk/2005/01/17/quicken_killed_off/|title=Intuit UK kills Quicken and TaxCalc |work=The Register|date=[[2005-01-17]] |first=John |last=Oates |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref>
* Quicken users have reported an unusually large number of [[software bug]]s for a commercial product, both minor and major, many of which have not been fixed in recent versions and updates.<ref name="qc2008">{{cite web |url=http://www.quickencommunity.com/webx/.efff8e6/0?5|title=Quicken Community - Quicken 2008 Bug List|work=Quicken Community|date=[[2008-01-27]] |last=nathanau |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref><ref name="qc2009">{{cite web |url=http://www.quickencommunity.com/webx/.59b5a583/0?5|title=Quicken Community - Quicken 2009 Bug List|work=Quicken Community|date=[[2008-08-28]] |last=thecreator |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref><ref name="abt2009">{{cite web |url=http://financialsoft.about.com/od/reviewsfinancesoftware/fr/Quicken_New_2.htm|title=The Best and Worst Features in Quicken|work=About.com|date=[[2009-01-14]] |first=Shelley |last=Elmblad |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref>
* Quicken users have reported an unusually large number of [[software bug]]s for a commercial product, both minor and major, many of which have not been fixed in recent versions and updates.<ref name="qc2008">{{cite web |url=http://www.quickencommunity.com/webx/.efff8e6/0?5|title=Quicken Community - Quicken 2008 Bug List|work=Quicken Community|date=[[2008-01-27]] |last=nathanau |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref><ref name="qc2009">{{cite web |url=http://www.quickencommunity.com/webx/.59b5a583/0?5|title=Quicken Community - Quicken 2009 Bug List|work=Quicken Community|date=[[2008-08-28]] |last=thecreator |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref><ref name="abt2009">{{cite web |url=http://financialsoft.about.com/od/reviewsfinancesoftware/fr/Quicken_New_2.htm|title=The Best and Worst Features in Quicken|work=About.com|date=[[2009-01-14]] |first=Shelley |last=Elmblad |accessdate=2009-04-06 }}</ref>

*Quicken Online is only available to users in the USA or Canada
